sub_title: Technical Advisor at Canyon Energy ltd
summary:
Established E&P professional with 35+ years experience in the international upstream oil and gas (LNG) world in Integrated Field Development Planning and Maturation, Project Development, Project management and Engineering in multicultural challenging locations, with Shell, Comprimo, Wintershall, ADDAX, ABB Lummus Global, GDFSUEZ, Mott MacDonald and CEPSA. 
Gained experience in all aspects of the oil and gas industry, worked internationally offshore, onshore, jungle and desert environment, in projects and design management of greenfield /brownfield projects across the complete project development spectrum from acquisition, asses, concept select, define and project execution: technical and economic analysis and evaluations, investment evaluations, strategic long term planning, portfolio analysis, new business development, asset/company acquisitions and divestments.
Highly regarded as the authority on field life cost, process, process control, facility, maintenance and operational issues. Excellent analytical skills with the ability to take the overall business need into account. Excellent inside in project economics, and full field life cost. 
Working and communicating at senior management levels; interfacing, influencing, negotiating and aligning internal Directors, Joint Venture Partners, Governments and Contractors. 
Has a pragmatic approach and likes things to get done. Achieves assigned targets in a difficult environment with conflicting priorities. Team player with proven leadership qualities particularly in cross-discipline activities. Self-motivated leader, with strong communication, leadership, organisational and delivery skills, with a proven ability to build and develop teams and bring structure to challenging environments to generate and deliver solutions which are both strategic and realistic.

profile_positions.description: Support of Tehran Engineering Company (TEC) in the Redevelopment of the Karanj, Parsi and Rag-e-Safid project executed for MAPNA who has the intention to take over operatorship of the field on behave of NISOC. The work ranges from brownfield upgrades to improve production, development proposals including cost estimates and project schedules  for the redevelopment. and extending the plant life.
profile_positions.title: Technical Advisor

profile_positions.description:
As an independent Consultant involved in a variety of multi-discipline Oil and Gas Projects amongst the technical evaluation of the PM9 acquisition in Malaysia, the 2015 Mexico bid round for exploration and extraction, the Barracuda coded project, the marginal field development of the Ruwais oil accumulation in Abu Dhabi, the concept select for the B131 development in Peru, the redevelopment of the near shore G5-43 (Shongkla) field in Thailand, the KEN development in Algeria and the Kenia Lamu farm-in opportunity and Kenya 11A development.
		Introduced the E&P business model & decision process providing the framework for governance of all E&P activities related to hydrocarbon maturation.
profile_positions.title: Snr. Technical Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Lead of the Development and Technical group with additional responsibility for technical authority, technical safety and support of acquisitions. 
		Team Lead for all PEER Reviews part of the stage gate process GdFSuez applies for their project approvals reviewing sub surface, drilling, facilities engineering and economics until project sanction.
		In addition to the PR have a governance role overseeing all ongoing projects (approx. 50) within the GdFSuez EPI organization and member of the Technical Steering Committee and Tender Board for the Cygnus development in the Southern part of the North Sea and the Bonaparte floating LNG project in Perth Australia. Technical evaluation of project and preparation of proposals for development of unconventional gas and condensate resources in Poland and establishing of a specific shale gas development team was also part of the performed work.

 		The crude is extremely heavy which result in technical challenges for flow assurance, oil/water separation and desalination.
